msContents.summary: Donation of land revenue on salt pans to the treasure (pāṇṭaram) of the lord of Tiruvoṟṟiyūr by the villagers of Maṇali.

handDesc.p: No distinction between e and ē, nor between o and ō.
Spelling na occasionally used instead of expected ṉa.
